PerfectNetExp.abs: wellborn 韦尔伯恩, wellbred 良种的, wellborne 韦尔伯恩
教育学科行业专业英语第1010页-B2B98.Com ... wellbeing 健康幸福 wellbred 教养良好的 wellconducted 品行端正的.

entry.tran: 有教养的;有涵养的;知书达理的
entry.def: A well-bred person is very polite and has good manners.

example.ex: She was too well bred to want to hurt the little boy's feelings.
example.tran: 她很有涵养，不想去伤害小男孩的感情。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
